item.title: 树莓派部署人脸识别
item.description: 环境 树莓派3b TF卡class10,64g 罗技摄像头 安装 依赖 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 sudo apt install cmake build-essential pkg-config git sudo apt install libjpeg-dev libtiff-dev libjasper-dev libpng-dev libwebp-dev libopenexr-dev sudo apt install libavcodec-dev libavformat-dev libswscale-dev libv4l-dev libxvidcore-dev libx264-dev libdc1394-22-dev libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-dev libgstreamer1.0-dev sudo apt install libgtk-3-dev libqtgui4
